Apps.Description: Note Leloo Application in Android Phone using a Flutter FrameWork there is only 1 option for sign in (Google Sign In ). in which application user can upload there notes in only .pdf format and also another user can download it
E-Commerce Application in Android Phone using a Flutter In This Project i used firebase as backend and for authenticator i used firebase auth
Weather Application in Android Phone using a Flutter. in this Appplication i used and rest API https://openweathermap.org/ it may not show an weather details in App because of API is Limitation

Chat Application in Android Phone using a Flutter. in this project user can chat with there friends and chat is in private mode nobody can read your chat with your friend and in this application i used firebase messaging ( notification sent to user )
